title: [K-12] Social Studies Competency Enhancement Program Using Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Mobile Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Learner-Tailored Education to Enhance Social Sector Practical Competencies in Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain core social science concepts (e.g., organizational communication, digital citizenship) with over 80% accuracy using interactive content in mobile applications
Learners can analyze complex social issues and propose solutions through mobile-based discussion activities with peer learners
Learners can monitor learning outcomes on a weekly basis and develop improvement plans using self-assessment features in the application

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
